roleset.name: distribute by proxy
roleset.note: SYNDICATE-V NOTES: Naturally this occurs most often as a passive participle akaadjective: "many syndicated television shows". (from syndicate.01-v)
SYNDICATION-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from syndication.01-n)

example.name: rarely active with all args
example.text: In fact, [Manufacturers Hanover]-1 said in its third-quarter earnings report that fees from *trace*-1 syndicating loans to other banks dropped 48%, to $21 million.

example.name: usually passive
example.text: Paramount Domestic TV and MCA TV formed a joint venture last month, named Premier Advertiser Sales, to sell advertising in [programs]-1 syndicated *trace*-1 by both companies, such as ``Star Trek: the Next Generation,'' ``Charles in Charge'' and ``Friday the 13th: the Series.''
